name: Faint Negated
description: Prevents the Hunter from being Stunned

name: Faint Prob Halved
description: Reduces Stun buildup on the Hunter by half

name: Faint Duration(x2)
description: Doubles duration of Stun on the Hunter

name: Poison Negated
description: Prevents the Hunter from being Poisoned

name: Poison Dur Halved
description: Halves Poison damage taken

name: Poison Dur(x2)
description: Doubles Poison damage taken

name: Paralysis Negated
description: Prevents the Hunter from being Paralyzed

name: Para Duration Halved
description: Halves the duration of Paralysis on the Hunter

name: Para Duration(x2)
description: Doubles duration of Paralysis on the Hunter

name: Sleep Negated
description: Prevents the Hunter from being put to Sleep

name: Sleep Dur Halved
description: Halves the duration of Sleep on the Hunter

name: Sleep Duration(x2)
description: Doubles duration of Sleep on the Hunter

name: Antiseptic
description: Prevents the Hunter from being afflicted with Soiled

name: Fatigue Cancellation
description: Prevents the Hunter from being afflicted with Fatigue

name: Snow Res
description: Prevents the Hunter from being afflicted with Snowman

name: Quake Resistance
description: Protects against Quakes

name: High Grade Earplug
description: Protects against all Roars

name: Earplug
description: Protects against small Roars

name: Dragon Wind Breaker
description: Protects against all Wind Pressure

name: High Wind Res
description: Protects against High Wind Pressure

name: Low Wind Res
description: Protects against Low Wind Pressure

name: Steal No Effect
description: Prevents items from being stolen

name: Self-Defense
description: Composite skill: Poison Negated, Paralysis Negated, Sleep Negated, Faint Negated

name: Metallic Protection
description: Composite Skill: TerrainDamageNegate, Fire Res +10

name: Composite Skill: Dragon Wind Breaker, Snow Res
Fiery Protection
description: Composite Skill: Poison Negated, Steal No Effect, Fatigue Cancellation

name: Sharpness +1
description: Increases the weapon's visible sharpness level

name: Sharp Sword
description: Reduces sharpness consumption by half. If the original cost was already 1, there is a 50% chance no sharpness will be consumed

name: Blunt
description: Doubles sharpness consumption

name: ESP
description: Attacks will not bounce

name: Sharpening Skl Inc
description: Whetstone items sharpen weapons in a single stroke

name: Sharpening Skl Half
description: Halves the sharpness recovery of Whetstone items

name: Guard +2
description: Further reduces damage, knockback and stamina usage when blocking

name: Guard +1
description: Reduces damage, knockback and stamina usage when blocking

name: Guard -1
description: Increases damage, knockback and stamina usage when blocking

name: Auto-Guard
description: Automatically blocks attacks if possible

name: Art of Unsheathing
description: Unsheathe attacks will always hit critically

name: Stellar Hunter
description: Composite Skill: Sharpness +1, Attack Up (Large)

name: NormalS/RapidBow Up
description: Multiplies damage dealt by Normal S and Rapid Arrows by 1.1

name: PierceS/PierceBow Up
description: Multiplies damage dealt by Pierce S and Pierce Arrows by 1.1

name: PelletS/ScattrBow Up
description: Multiplies damage dealt by Pellet S and Spread Arrows by 1.3

name: Normal S All LV Add
description: Enables Bowguns to load Normal S Lv 1~3

name: Pierce S All LV Add
description: Enables Bowguns to load Pierce S Lv 1~3

name: Pierce S LV1 Add
description: Enables Bowguns to load Pierce S Lv 1

name: Pellet S All LV Add
description: Enables Bowguns to load Pellet S Lv 1~3

name: Pellet S LV 1 Add
description: Enables Bowguns to load Pellet S Lv 1

name: Crag S LV 1 Add
description: Enables Bowguns to load Crag S Lv 1

name: Clust S All LV Add
description: Enables Bowguns to load Clust S Lv 1~3

name: Clust S LV 1 Add
description: Enables Bowguns to load Clust S Lv 1

name: Reloading Speed +3
description: Improves Reloading Speed by 3 levels

name: Reloading Speed +2
description: Improves Reloading Speed by 2 levels

name: Reloading Speed +1
description: Improves Reloading Speed by 1 level

name: Reloading Speed -1
description: Worsens Reloading Speed by 1 level

name: Reloading Speed -2
description: Worsens Reloading Speed by 2 levels

name: Reloading Speed -3
description: Worsens Reloading Speed by 3 levels

name: Auto Reload
description: Bowgun: Allows one to shoot without reloading until the ammunition is depleted or changed. Does not work on Rapid Fired ammo types. Maximizes recoil and makes recoil lowering skills ineffective. Bow: Coatings do not have to be loaded to be used.

name: Recoil Reduction +2
description: Improves Recoil by 4 levels

name: Recoil Reduction +1
description: Improves Recoil by 2 levels

name: Shell Deviation Down
description: Reduces bullet and arrow deviation

name: Shell Deviation Up
description: Increases bullet and arrow deviation

name: Poison Coating Add
description: Enables Bows to load Poison Coatings

name: Paralysis Coat Add
description: Enables Bows to load Paralysis Coatings

name: Sleep Coating Add
description: Enables Bows to load Sleep Coatings

name: Power Coating Add
description: Enables Bows to load Power Coatings

name: ClsRngCAdd
description: Enables Bows to load Close Range Coatings

name: Straight & True
description: Composite Skill: NormalS/RapidBow Up, PierceS/PierceBow Up, PelletS/ScattrBow Up

name: Reckless Abandon +3
description: Affinity +30% If the weapon's natural affinity is not negative, adds a further 5% in case of Blue Sharpness and 10% in case of White or Purple Sharpness.

name: Reckless Abandon +2
description: Affinity +20%

name: Reckless Abandon +1
description: Affinity +10%

name: Reckless Abandon -1
description: Affinity -5%

name: Reckless Abandon -2
description: Affinity -10%

name: Abnormal Sts Atk Up
description: Multiplies Status Ailment values by 1.125.

name: Element Attack Up
description: Multiplies Elemental damage by 1.2. Does not apply to the Fire component of Shelling, Wyvern Fire, Crag S and Clust S damage

name: Damage Rec Speed +2
description: Quadruples natural recovery speed

name: Damage Rec Speed +1
description: Doubles natural recovery speed

name: Damage Rec Speed -1
description: Halves natural recovery speed

name: Damage Rec Speed -2
description: Quarters natural recovery speed

name: Divine Protection
description: 25% chance of reducing damage taken by 30%

name: Demonic Protection
description: 25% chance of increasing damage taken by 30%

name: Guard Inc
description: Allows certain normally unblockable attacks to be blocked, such as Gas and Beam attacks.

name: Evade +2
description: Increases the invincibility period of an evade from 6/30 of a second to 12/30 of a second.

name: Evade +1
description: Increases the invincibility period of an evade from 6/30 of a second to 10/30 of a second.

name: Evade Distance Up
description: Increases the distance traveled when dodging by 50%

name: Adrenaline +2
description: Increases defense by 90 points and Atk by 30% if the Hunter's HP is below 40% of its maximum

name: Adrenaline +1
description: Increases defense by 90 points if the Hunter's HP is below 40% of its maximum

name: Worry
description: Increases defense by 42 points reduces Atk by 30% if the Hunter's HP is below 40% of its maximum

name: Gunnery King
description: Increases damage on Ballista, Cannon, Gunlance Shelling and Wyvern Fire by 20%. Doubles the power of Crag S. Wyvern Fire cooldown reduced from 120s to 90s
Gunnery Master

name: Capacity Up
description: Increases the ammo capacity of Bowguns and Gunlance by 1. Adds a fourth charge level to Bows.

name: Focus
description: Speeds up charge time for Greatsword, Hammer and Bow. Longsword accrues Spirit faster

name: Distracted
description: Slows down charge time for Greatsword, Hammer and Bow. Longsword accrues Spirit slower

name: Guts
description: Survives with 1 HP if above 64 HP and receiving an attack which would otherwise kill. Does not work if Paralyzed.

name: Emboldened
description: Composite Skill: Adrenaline +2, Guts

name: Farsight
description: Map always available

name: Map Unavailable
description: Map unavailable even with the item

name: Autotracker
description: Boss Monsters do not need to be painted to be tracked. Tracking is more detailed.

name: Detect
description: Adds more detail to the tracking of painted Monsters. 2/3 chance of Psychoserum effect at quest start and every 5 minutes.

name: Gathering +2
description: Reduces the chance of premature node exhaustion from 5/32 to 1/32

name: Gathering +1
description: Reduces the chance of premature node exhaustion from 5/32 to 3/32

name: Gathering -1
description: Increases the chance of premature node exhaustion from 5/32 to 9/32

name: Carving Celebrity
description: Increases the number of Carves by 1 as well as preventing flinching while gathering and fishing

name: Carving Iron Man
description: Prevents flinching from small attacks while gathering and fishing

name: High Speed Gathering
description: Carving and Gathering animations speed up

name: Backpacking Expert
description: Increases speed while transporting heavy objects and slightly increases the distance one can fall without breaking them

name: Divine Whim
description: Makes Boomerangs, Pickaxes, Bugnets and Horn items 50% less likely to break

name: Spirit's Whim
description: Makes Boomerangs, Pickaxes, Bugnets and Horn items 25% less likely to break

name: Spectre's Whim
description: Makes Boomerangs, Pickaxes, Bugnets and Horn items 25% more likely to break

name: Devil's Whim
description: Makes Boomerangs, Pickaxes, Bugnets and Horn items 50% more likely to break

name: Fishing Expert
description: Fish will always take the bait in the first bite

name: Heat Cancel (Hi)
description: Prevents health loss from Heat in all locations

name: Heat Cancel (Lo)
description: Prevents health loss from Heat in all locations but the hottest parts of volcanoes. Reduces health loss to a third in those areas.

name: Heat Inc (Lo)
description: Increases health loss from heat by half

name: Heat Inc (Hi)
description: Doubles health loss from heat

name: Cold Elimination(Hi)
description: Prevents stamina loss from cold in all areas

name: Cold Elimination(Lo)
description: Prevents stamina loss from cold in all areas but the top of the Snowy Mountains. Reduces stamina loss from cold to a third in those areas

name: Cold Increase (Lo)
description: Increases stamina loss from cold by half

name: Cold Increase (Hi)
description: Doubles stamina loss from cold

name: TerrainDamageNegate
description: Prevents health loss from stepping on lava or being around Lunastra's and Teostra's Auras

name: TerrainDamageHalf
description: Halves health loss from stepping on lava or being around Lunastra's and Teostra's Auras

name: TerrainDamageInc(Lo)
description: Increases health loss from stepping on lava or being around Lunastra's and Teostra's Auras by half

name: TerrainDamageInc(Hi)
description: Doubles health loss from stepping on lava or being around Lunastra's and Teostra's Auras

name: Runner
description: Halves stamina consumption for all actions which gradually consume stamina

name: Flat Footed
description: Increases stamina consumption for all actions which gradually consume stamina by 20%

name: Constitution +2
description: Halves stamina usage for dodging and guarding

name: Constitution +1
description: Reduces stamina usage for dodging and guarding by a third

name: Constitution -1
description: Increases stamina usage for dodging and guarding by 20%

name: Constitution -2
description: Increases stamina usage for dodging and guarding by 35%

name: Hunger Negated
description: Stamina does not naturally decrease over time

name: Hunger Halved
description: Doubles the time it takes for stamina to naturally decrease

name: Hunger Increase (Lo)
description: Reduces by a quarter the time it takes for stamina to naturally decrease

name: Hunger Increase (Hi)
description: Reduces by half the time it takes for stamina to naturally decrease

name: Stealth
description: Monsters target you more often

name: Taunt
description: Monsters target you less often

name: Luck Booster
description: Chance of adding an extra regular reward slot on quest rewards increased from 22/32 to 29/32

name: Good Luck
description: Chance of adding an extra regular reward slot on quest rewards increased from 22/32 to 26/32

name: Bad Luck
description: Chance of adding an extra regular reward slot on quest rewards reduced from 22/32 to 16/32

name: Calamity
description: Chance of adding an extra regular reward slot on quest rewards reduced from 22/32 to 8/32

name: Trap Master
description: Increases the setup speed of Traps, Bombs, Lightning Rods and Meat Baits. Guarantees Trap and Net combinations will succeed

name: Tranquilizing Celeb
description: Guarantees the third slot and adds a 22/32 chance of a fourth capture slot.

name: Tranquilizing Whiz
description: Guarantees the addition of a third capture reward slot. Normally the chance is 22/32.

name: Tranquilizing Guru
description: Changes a painted monster's marker to yellow when capturable

name: HealthRecItemsImprvd
description: Health recovery items heal 25% more HP

name: HealthRecItemsWeaknd
description: Health recovery items heal 25% less HP

name: Item Usage Improve
description: Increases the duration of effects bestowed by items by half

name: Item Usage Decline
description: Increases the duration of effects bestowed by items by a third

name: Wide Area +2
description: Other players and Felyne Companions will receive the effect of Herbs, Potions, Power Seeds, Armor Seeds and Antidotes used by the player.

name: Wide Area +1
description: Other players and Felyne Companions will receive half of the effect of Herbs, Potions, Power Seeds and Armor Seeds used by the player, as well as the full effect of Antidotes.

name: Throwing Skill Up
description: Increases the throwing distance of thrown items with the exception of Boomerang. Boomerang is half as likely to break.

name: Bomber
description: Increases damage for all Bomb items and Lightning Rods by 50%. Guarantees all Bomb, Lightning Rod, Gunpowder and Sonic Bomb combines will succeed

name: Scavenger
description: All food and drink items have a chance of adding an extra 25 stamina when consumed.

name: Filled Up
description: All meat items, including fish steaks, have a chance of adding an extra 25 stamina upon being consumed.

name: Quick Eating
description: Speeds up item consumption animations.

name: Slow Life
description: Slows down item consumption animations.

name: BBQ Celebrity
description: Increases the timing window to get a Well-Done Steak

name: So-Called BBQ King
description: Reduces the timing window to get a Well-Done Steak

name: Flute Expert
description: Flute items are half as likely to break. Hunting Horn songs duration extended by one minute.

name: Combine Success +45%
description: Combination Success rate increases by 45%

name: Combine Success +25%
description: Combination success rate increases by 25

name: Combine Success +15%
description: Combination success rate increases by 15%

name: Combine Success -5%
description: Combination success rate decreases by 5%

name: Combine Success -10%
description: Combination success rate decreases by 10%

name: Combine Success -15%
description: Combination success rate decreases by 15%

name: Bullet Limit
description: Guarantees the maximum yield for shot and coating combinations

name: Alchemy
description: Allows access to special combination recipes

name: ComradGuidance&Trade
description: Increases Felyne Comrade experience and skill point gain by half

name: Comrade Guidance
description: Increases Felyne Comrade experience point gain by half

name: Comrade Attack Up
description: Increases Felyne Comrade's attack by 40

name: Comrade Defense Up
description: Increases Felyne Comrade's defense by 60
